data.comment: The first-half is under way at Luminus Arena - Brugge kick-off to start the match.
Hans Vanaken heads in to make it 0-1 at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 28, Simon Deli (Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway. Genk with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Genk have been awarded a penalty in Genk...
At Luminus Arena, Kouassi Eboue has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 60, An attacking Genk player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Simon Mignolet (Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Theo Bongonda scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
Charles De Ketelaere is replacing Emmanuel Dennis for Brugge at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 79, Luca Oyen is on a sub for Mats Moller Daehli for Genk.
Ruud Vormer (Brugge) has received a yellow card from Bram Van Driessche.
Joakim Maehle is booked for the home team.
In the minute 82, Brugge make their second substitution with Siebe Schrijvers replacing Ruud Vormer.
Brugge's Youssouph Badji scores with his head to give his side a 1-2 lead.
The home team have replaced Kouassi Eboue with Benjamin Nygren. This is the second substitution made today by Hannes Wolf.
In the minute 89, Jere Uronen (Genk) gets a yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a third substitution, with Eder Balanta replacing Mats Rits.
Hannes Wolf is making the team's third substitution at Luminus Arena with Gerardo Arteaga replacing Jere Uronen.
Gerardo Arteaga for Genk has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
